title: Look inside the Airbnb mansion where Chrissy Teigen and John Legend stayed
text:
Airbnb SHARES 
During a stop on John Legend's Darkness and Light tour, Legend and wife Chrissy Teigen kicked back in a private mansion in Shawnee, Kansas and of course, they shared the experience on Instagram. 
Legend posted a video of himself, Teigen and their daughter, Luna, relaxing on an outdoor swing the size of a bed. "Thanks to the good people at @Airbnb for gifting me and my family a home away from home on tour!" he captioned it. "So nice to have a kitchen, a backyard, and a swinging patio couch!" 
Though Teigen and Legend's trip last summer was on the house from Airbnb, the space, which sleeps seven, according to the listing, is available for anyone to rent â€” if you can afford the $10,000-a-night price tag. 
Here's a look inside. 
The entryway opens into a chic living space, complete with high ceilings, a fireplace and a cozy sitting area. Airbnb 
A glass-paneled wall slides away to create an indoor/outdoor living room, allowing fresh air to breeze through the house. Airbnb 
The open kitchen has the requisite stainless steel appliances, ample counter space and a breakfast nook that overlooks the lush backyard. Airbnb 
The estate has five bedrooms, two of which are furnished with king-sized beds. Airbnb 
His and hers vanities make the master feel more like a private spa than a bathroom. Airbnb 
Indoor amenities include a home office, craft room and billiards table. Airbnb 
But the resort-like backyard is the highlight of the property. Guests can spend days lounging in the sun beside the pool and nights curled up next to the firepit. Airbnb 
An outdoor kitchen makes it entertaining easy. Airbnb 
At night the backyard twinkles, showing off the impeccable landscaping even after the sun has set. It sure won't feel like you're in Kansas anymore. Airbnb
